karpathy: Andrej Karpathy is a computer scientist and AI researcher who was the director of AI at Tesla and co-founder of OpenAI. He's known for his work on deep learning and neural networks.
huang: Jensen Huang is the CEO of NVIDIA, a company at the forefront of AI hardware development, particularly GPUs that power most modern AI models.
keller: Jim Keller is a renowned microprocessor engineer who has worked on CPU architectures at AMD, Apple, Tesla, and Intel. He's known for designing high-performance computing chips.
hotz: George Hotz, also known as geohot, is a programmer and entrepreneur known for jailbreaking the iPhone and PlayStation 3. He founded Comma.ai, which develops autonomous driving technology.
